title: WATCH: Zuma makes surprise visit to Nyanga police station | News24
text:
WATCH: Zuma makes surprise visit to Nyanga police station 14 February, 01:05 PM 
"The perpetrators have it easy." So said President Jacob Zuma during a surprise meeting to a Cape Town police station on Tuesday. Watch. 
Nyanga was ranked in the worst ten precincts for crime in the Western Cape in 2016; 10 785 crimes were reportedly committed in Nyanga alone last year. 
Zuma visited the station ahead of a post-State of the Nation question and answer session in Parliament. Share it:
